title: How to Draw Ugly Dolls

steps.headline: Choose the ugly you want to draw.
steps.description: You can find it from the internet or use a doll you have.

steps.headline: Get the other materials you need.
steps.description: Paper and Pencil, and if you would like use these extras: Colored pencils, scissors, glue stick, construction paper, glitter glue, and accessories like buttons.

steps.headline: Start with their body shape, most of them are shaped like an 8 or a snowman.
steps.description: So for most draw two large circles, and for some like the worm you will have to draw more.

steps.headline: Do their head basics, which consists of the head shape and antennae.
Do the same for the body.
steps.description: Just instead of antennae draw the basic limbs.

steps.headline: Add the facial details, keep it simple.
Draw an apron is your character is Wage.
Erase all the extra lines when you are finished sketching and trace the ones you want to keep in pen.
If you want you can color your ugly in.
steps.description: You can also add accessories like buttons.

steps.headline: Cut it out and put it one construction paper to keep it safe.
If you want you could outline it in glitter glue for extra pizazz.

text: Choose the ugly you want to draw. You can find it from the internet or use a doll you have. Get the other materials you need. Paper and Pencil, and if you would like use these extras: Colored pencils, scissors, glue stick, construction paper, glitter glue, and accessories like buttons. Start with their body shape, most of them are shaped like an 8 or a snowman. So for most draw two large circles, and for some like the worm you will have to draw more. Do their head basics, which consists of the head shape and antennae.  Do the same for the body. Just instead of antennae draw the basic limbs. Add the facial details, keep it simple.  Draw an apron is your character is Wage.  Erase all the extra lines when you are finished sketching and trace the ones you want to keep in pen.  If you want you can color your ugly in. You can also add accessories like buttons. Cut it out and put it one construction paper to keep it safe.  If you want you could outline it in glitter glue for extra pizazz.  Hang it up.
sentences: Choose the ugly you want to draw.
You can find it from the internet or use a doll you have.
Get the other materials you need.
Paper and Pencil, and if you would like use these extras: Colored pencils, scissors, glue stick, construction paper, glitter glue, and accessories like buttons.
Start with their body shape, most of them are shaped like an 8 or a snowman.
So for most draw two large circles, and for some like the worm you will have to draw more.
Do their head basics, which consists of the head shape and antennae.
Do the same for the body.
Just instead of antennae draw the basic limbs.
Add the facial details, keep it simple.
Draw an apron is your character is Wage.
Erase all the extra lines when you are finished sketching and trace the ones you want to keep in pen.
If you want you can color your ugly in.
You can also add accessories like buttons.
Cut it out and put it one construction paper to keep it safe.
If you want you could outline it in glitter glue for extra pizazz.
